resources.string:
Hi, mi name is Mateusz Idziejczak. 

I love cat. 

The kind that is alive and walks around my house
Fun fact is that I have several catuariums and also a river. 

I like eating cat, too. Raw cat. Grilled cat. Smoked cat. Poached cat - not so much. 
And sometimes I even go cating. 
And even less sometimes, I actually catch something. 

Once, when I was camping in Canada, and very hungry, I even caught a large cat with my hands. 

I'll be happy to teach you how to make your own catuarium. 
You should ask someone else about cating, though.
